name: Rewind This (Kaish, Euler Moises)
description:
To rewind something you need to record what was done

We humans do this through memory

Are you able to rewind? Rewind This


• Memorize the Route

• Click and Drag the Cyan Energy

• Rewind doing the Reverse Route

• Win the 6 Levels


• Euler Moises: Sound Design

• Kaish: Game Design / Art

Game developed for Brackeys Jam
August 2020
Theme: "Rewind"

Moving the mouse too fast can cause bugs.
If the click stops working, press "R" to continue.
